meanings.sent1: She was hutching the kitchen with new cabinets.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter is hutching the living room with shelves.
meanings.sent3: The hutching of the pantry made it look like a mini grocery store.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was hutching the room into a cozy haven.
meanings.sent5: The hutching of the bookshelves transformed the room completely.

meanings.definition: The act of placing something in a hutch.
meanings.sent1: The hutching of the dishes was meticulous.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the hutching of her collectibles in the display cabinet.
meanings.sent3: The hutching of the toys in the hutch made the room tidy.
meanings.sent4: The hutching of the flowers in the vase brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: His hutching of the books in the bookcase was organized and neat.
